page.title: 09Slaley Show.
page.content: 1985 will see the 127th Slaley Show held on {Townhead Field.} Over 50 people have organized {270 competitive {classes} including flowers, vegetables, flower arranging, cookery, handicraft and children's classes in two marquees. Outside over 200{sheep will be judged in classes for Suffolk, Blue-Faced Leicester, Mule and fat lambs. There are classes for goats, terriers and lurchers together with pony sports and a clay-pigeon shoot. { {Special attractions} have been Police Dog Displays, a Parade of Heavy Horses, a Highland Pipe Band and Foxhounds.
